description.EN:
CZ/SK/PL/EN/RU session stats modification

CZ: obsah archivu rozbalte do zlozky s hrou (napr.: C:\Games\World_of_Tanks)
EN: unpack archive to game folder (eg: C:\Games\World_of_Tanks)

for other langs than czech: read readme.txt in Optional Configs directory

For good visibility of WN8/EFF I recommend this mod: https://wgmods.net/66/
